title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library to pull, build, and run large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama REST API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & chat components (PyPI: langchain-ollama).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Android support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite, consuming Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) client for chatting with Ollama models, written in Python.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron-based desktop GUI for Ollama with markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, exposing Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama + llama-index to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Active GitHub discussion thread on optimizing Ollama for NVIDIA GPUs and Docker images.

title: ollama-microsoft
summary: Microsoft Semantic Kernel connector for Ollama, letting .NET developers swap in local models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into guild channels; configurable roles & limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers questions using a local Ollama model with thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rustica
summary: Experimental Rust rewrite of the Ollama server focusing on WasmEdge runtime portability.
